description: Connect AI model plans via a configurable vendor profile.
commands.coding-plans.manage.title: Manage Coding Plans Configuration
configuration.title: Coding Plans
configuration.coding-plans.vendors.descr: Configure AI model vendors with their endpoints and models.
Must match a vendor name in coding-plans.vendors.
providers.codingPlans.config.apiKey.desc: API key for the selected vendor (stored securely).
configuration.coding-plans.commitMessage: Show the "Generate Commit Message" command in Source Control and Command Palette.
When enabled, read the latest 20 commit messages and mimic their writing style for generated commit messages.
Preferred vendor name for commit message generation (e.g. Zhipu). Leave empty to always prompt.
Preferred model name for commit message generation (e.g. glm-4-flash). Used together with modelVendor.
Advanced commit-message options as a JSON object (prompt, maxDiffLines, pipelineMode, summary* thresholds, bullet count, subject length, validation switches).
